marytts.util.data.text
Class XwavesLabelfileDataSource

java.lang.Object
  marytts.util.data.text.XwavesLabelfileDataSource

public class XwavesLabelfileDataSource
extends java.lang.Object

A class to read and parse labels in a text file. The file format should conform to that used by ESPS Xwaves and the many other labeling programs which support that format.

Author:
Ingmar Steiner
